## 사건 정보

## 판결문 요약







Madden v. State                                                     










[WITHDRAWN 11-22-95]





IN THE
TENTH COURT OF APPEALS
                       

No. 10-94-142-CR

        ROLAND JEROME MADDEN,
                                                                                       Appellant
        v.

        THE STATE OF TEXAS,
                                                                                       Appellee
                                 

From the Criminal District Court
Dallas County, Texas
Trial Court # F93-41793-KH
                                                                                                    

O P I N I O N
                                                                                                    

          A jury convicted the appellant, Roland Jerome Madden, of aggravated assault, enhanced
by two prior convictions, and assessed punishment at life in prison.  Tex. Penal Code Ann. §
22.02 (Vernon Supp. 1995).  Madden raises nine points of error on appeal.  For the following
reasons, we will affirm.
          On the evening of April 17, 1993, Antrum Donell and Damon Jerome Bell were visiting
Bell's girlfriend, Kim, at her apartment.  Bell had brought a neighbor's dog for Kim to play with.


 
Madden and Kim's sister, Kasandra arrived some time thereafter with their four-month-old baby.
